name: Houndoom
description: The Dark Pokémon. They spew flames mixed with poison to finish off their opponents. They divvy up their prey evenly among the members of their pack.

abilities.name: Early Bird
abilities.description: This Pokémon has advantage on rolls to wake from sleep.

abilities.name: Flash Fire
abilities.description: This Pokémon takes no damage from fire or fire-type attacks. Instead, immediately after taking a hit from a fire-type move, or in open flames, double the STAB bonus on the next fire-type move.

abilities.name: Unnerve
abilities.description: Opponents in combat with this Pokémon cannot eat held berries.
